meta.name: Real-Time Lead Qualification, Scoring & CRM Integration System using Jotform

parameters.content:
## üéØ Lead Qualification & Distribution

**Purpose:** Transform lead chaos into systematic qualification and instant routing to the right sales rep

**Key Features:**
- AI-powered BANT lead scoring
- Intelligent territory/industry routing
- Automatic CRM contact creation
- Instant rep notifications
- 24-hour follow-up escalation
- Complete lead tracking

**ROI:** 5-min response time, 300% conversion increase

## üìù Jotform Lead Capture Fields:
- Company Name (q3_companyName)
- Contact Name (q4_contactName)
- Email (q5_email)
- Phone (q6_phone)
- Company Size (q7_companySize)
- Budget Range (q8_budgetRange)
- Timeline (q9_timeline)
- Industry (q10_industry)
- Current Solution (q11_currentSolution)
- Pain Points (q12_painPoints)
Create your form for free on [Jotform using this link](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)

## ü§ñ AI Lead Scoring (BANT)

**Analyzes:**
- Budget: Financial capacity assessment
- Authority: Decision-maker identification
- Need: Pain point severity analysis
- Timeline: Purchase urgency evaluation

**Outputs:**
- Lead score (0-100)
- Qualification tier (Hot/Warm/Cold)
- Routing recommendation
- Follow-up strategy

options.systemMessage: You are an expert B2B sales qualification analyst specializing in BANT methodology. Provide objective, data-driven lead assessments that help sales teams prioritize and convert opportunities effectively.

parameters.content:
## üéØ Intelligent Lead Routing

**Routing Logic:**
- Hot Leads (Score 75+) ‚Üí Senior Sales Rep
- Warm Leads (50-74) ‚Üí Mid-Level Rep
- Cold Leads (25-49) ‚Üí SDR/Nurture
- Unqualified (<25) ‚Üí Marketing Nurture

**Factors Considered:**
- Territory assignment
- Industry expertise
- Deal size capacity
- Current workload

## üìä CRM Integration

**Creates Contact Record With:**
- Complete lead information
- AI qualification scores
- BANT assessment details
- Assigned sales rep
- Next steps & talking points
- Timestamp tracking

**Integrates with:** HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, or any CRM via API

## üìß Instant Rep Notification

**Email Includes:**
- Complete lead profile
- AI qualification summary
- BANT score breakdown
- Key insights & red flags
- Recommended next steps
- Pre-written talking points
- One-click CRM access

**Ensures:** Sub-5-minute response time

parameters.subject: =üî• {{ $json.qualificationTier }} Lead Assigned: {{ $json.companyName }} (Score: {{ $json.leadScore }})

parameters.content:
## üîî Lead Confirmation Email

**Sent to Lead:**
- Thank you message
- Next steps timeline
- Contact info of assigned rep
- Company overview
- What to expect

**Builds Trust:** Immediate response shows professionalism and sets expectations

parameters.message:
=

Thank You!

We've received your inquiry

Hi {{ $json.contactName.split(' ')[0] }},

Thank you for reaching out! Your dedicated account executive will contact you within 5 minutes.

Your Account Executive

{{ $json.assignedRepName }}

Email: {{ $json.assignedRepEmail }}

We look forward to speaking with you soon!
parameters.subject: =Thank You for Your Interest!

parameters.content:
## üìä Analytics & Tracking

**Logs to Google Sheets:**
- Complete lead details
- AI scoring breakdown
- Assignment information
- Timestamps for tracking
- Response time metrics
- Conversion tracking

**Enables:** Performance analysis, rep comparison, lead source ROI
